materials.raw_text:
6 g of Arsenic (As) 
 6 g of Calcium (Ca)

 Calcium: Available at local hardware stores or online in the form of calcium carbonate. 
 Yttrium: Obtain from specialized metal suppliers or online.

preparation.raw_text:
1. In a fume hood, carefully measure out 6 g of arsenic powder. 
 2. Measure 6 g of calcium powder and 10 g of yttrium powder. 
 3. Combine all the measured powders in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 4. Use a spatula to thoroughly mix the powders until they are homogeneously blended.
